resources.string: Boundary is a Zcash-powered mobile wallet, built for unstoppable private payments. It's optimized for storage and real-world use of shielded $%sâ€”the truly private cryptocurrency.\n\nBoundary is based on Zashi, originally developed by the team at Electric Coin Company who set the industry standard for blockchain privacy and created the Zcash protocol.
